thread.title: BRIEF-Fusion Announces Definitive Agreement To Acquire Megapath

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fusion Announces Definitive Agreement To Acquire Megapath
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Fusion Connect Inc:
* FUSION ANNOUNCES DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE MEGAPATH
* FUSION CONNECT INC - TOTAL CONSIDERATION IN TRANSACTION IS $71.5 MILLION
* FUSION CONNECT - UP TO $10 MILLION OF CONSIDERATION IS PAYABLE AT FUSIONâ€™S ELECTION IN UNREGISTERED SHARES OF FUSION STOCK PRICED AT $5.78/SHARE
* FUSION CONNECT INC - INTENDS TO FUND CASH PORTION OF CONSIDERATION VIA BORROWINGS UNDER ITS FIRST LIEN SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
